testing.saveInLive: Savefiles cannot be used in live!

descriptions.1: [{{number}}] A Loyal Employee: Hire your first Worker.
descriptions.5: [{{number}}] A cog in the machine: Hire 5,000 Workers.
descriptions.6: [{{number}}] A nail in the machine: Hire 10,000 Workers.
descriptions.7: [{{number}}] Are we even in the machine anymore?: Hire 20,000 Workers.
descriptions.17: [{{number}}] It prints free money!: Build 100 Printers.
descriptions.20: [{{number}}] We're running out of Ink!: Build 10,000 Printers.
descriptions.22: [{{number}}] A national treasure: Establish 1 Coin Mint.
descriptions.23: [{{number}}] Now with competition!: Establish 10 Coin Mints.
descriptions.24: [{{number}}] Counterfeiting with Style!: Establish 100 Coin Mints.
descriptions.25: [{{number}}] Why do we need all these?: Establish 1000 Coin Mints.
descriptions.26: [{{number}}] No really, why??: Establish 5,000 Coin Mints.
descriptions.27: [{{number}}] Is no one to stop us???: Establish 10,000 Coin Mints.
descriptions.28: [{{number}}] Oh well, time to mint: Establish 20,000 Coin Mints.
descriptions.33: [{{number}}] Is this more demonic?: Create 6,666 Alchemies.
descriptions.35: [{{number}}] Unlocking secrets to the world: Create 42,777 Alchemies.
descriptions.36: [{{number}}] Leveling up: Prestige for at least 1 Diamond.
descriptions.37: [{{number}}] High-Tiered: Prestige for at least 1e+6 Diamonds.
descriptions.38: [{{number}}] Highly Regarded: Prestige for at least 1e+100 Diamonds.
descriptions.39: [{{number}}] Prestigious: Prestige for at least 1e+1000 Diamonds.
descriptions.40: [{{number}}] Legendary: Prestige for at least 1e+10000 Diamonds.
descriptions.41: [{{number}}] Divine: Prestige for at least 1e+77777 Diamonds.
descriptions.42: [{{number}}] Perfectly Respected: Prestige for at least 1e+250000 Diamonds.
descriptions.43: [{{number}}] A Simple Detour: Transcend for at least 1 Mythos.
descriptions.44: [{{number}}] Tunnel Vision: Transcend for at least 1e+6 Mythos.
descriptions.45: [{{number}}] Risen from the Ashes: Transcend for at least 1e+50 Mythos.
descriptions.46: [{{number}}] Paradigm Shift: Transcend for at least 1e+308 Mythos.
descriptions.47: [{{number}}] Preparation: Transcend for at least 1e+2000 Mythos.
descriptions.48: [{{number}}] Revising the Plan: Transcend for at least 1e+25000 Mythos.
descriptions.49: [{{number}}] Leaving the Universe: Transcend for at least 1e+100000 Mythos.
descriptions.50: [{{number}}] Going Quantum: Reincarnate for at least 1 Particle.
descriptions.51: [{{number}}] Tunneling Vision: Reincarnate for at least 100,000 Particles.
descriptions.52: [{{number}}] Simulating the World: Reincarnate for at least 1e+30 Particles.
descriptions.53: [{{number}}] Multidimensional Creation: Reincarnate for at least 1e+200 Particles.
descriptions.54: [{{number}}] Lepton Dance: Reincarnate for at least 1e+1500 Particles.
descriptions.55: [{{number}}] Do we have enough yet?: Reincarnate for at least 1e+5000 Particles.
descriptions.56: [{{number}}] I Feel Luck in My Cells: Reincarnate for at least 1e+7777 Particles.
descriptions.57: [{{number}}] One Way Only: Prestige without buying Multipliers.
descriptions.58: [{{number}}] Authentic Shifting: Transcend without having bought a Multiplier.
descriptions.59: [{{number}}] The Singularity: Reincarnate without having bought a Multiplier.
descriptions.60: [{{number}}] Gotta go SLOW!: Prestige without buying Accelerators or Accelerator Boosts.
descriptions.61: [{{number}}] I'm really going slow: Transcend without having bought Accelerators or Boosts.
descriptions.62: [{{number}}] Are we there yet?: Reincarnate without having bought Accelerators or Boosts.
descriptions.63: [{{number}}] A careful search for Diamonds: Get 1e120,000 Coins in [Reduced Diamonds] without buying Accelerators or Boosts.
descriptions.64: [{{number}}] Very Based: Prestige without purchasing Coin Upgrades.
descriptions.65: [{{number}}] Miser: Transcend without purchasing Coin Upgrades.
descriptions.66: [{{number}}] True Miser: Transcend without purchasing Coin or Diamond Upgrades.
descriptions.67: [{{number}}] Coinless Pursuit: Reincarnate without purchasing Coin Upgrades.
descriptions.68: [{{number}}] Diamonds don't matter to me!: Reincarnate without purchasing Coin or Diamond Upgrades.
descriptions.69: [{{number}}] Leave nothing behind: Reincarnate without purchasing Coin, Diamond or Mythos Upgrades.
descriptions.70: [{{number}}] Leave NOTHING behind.: Reincarnate without purchasing Coin, Diamond, Mythos, or Generator Upgrades.
descriptions.71: [{{number}}] Out of Order: Buy Generator Upgrade Row 1, #2 first in a Transcension (IV -> III)
descriptions.72: [{{number}}] More Out of Order: Buy Generator Upgrade Row 1, #3 first in a Transcension (III -> II)
descriptions.73: [{{number}}] Four's a Company: Buy Generator Upgrade Row 1, #4 first in a Transcension (II -> I)
descriptions.74: [{{number}}] Five's a Croud: Buy Generator Upgrade Row 1, #5 first in a Transcension (I -> V)
descriptions.75: [{{number}}] Vaseline without the Machine: Exit [No Multiplier] with at least 1e1000 coins and without any of the row 1 generator upgrades.
descriptions.76: [{{number}}] Rage against the Machine: Exit [No Accelerator] with at least 1e1000 coins and without any of the row 1 generator upgrades.
descriptions.77: [{{number}}] Amish Paradise: Exit [No Shards] with at least 1e99,999 coins and without any of the row 1 generator upgrades.
descriptions.81: [{{number}}] Multitasking Challenged: Complete [No Multiplier] ten times.
descriptions.82: [{{number}}] No Deaths: Complete [No Multiplier] twenty times.
descriptions.83: [{{number}}] Population One: Complete [No Multiplier] fifty times.
descriptions.84: [{{number}}] Insert Another Token: Complete [No Multiplier] seventy-five times.
descriptions.86: [{{number}}] Respawn Rate -12%: Complete [No Accelerator] three times.
descriptions.87: [{{number}}] Putting the Breaks On: Complete [No Accelerator] five times.
descriptions.88: [{{number}}] Racing a Sloth...: Complete [No Accelerator] ten times.
descriptions.89: [{{number}}] ... and Losing.: Complete [No Accelerator] twenty times.
descriptions.90: [{{number}}] Planck Distance Traveled: Complete [No Accelerator] fifty times.
descriptions.91: [{{number}}] Inverse-Ackermann Growth: Complete [No Accelerator] seventy-five times.
descriptions.93: [{{number}}] Augments are Stupid!: Complete [No Shards] three times.
descriptions.94: [{{number}}] Grandmasters are Brilliant!: Complete [No Shards] five times.
descriptions.95: [{{number}}] Gotta get those Grandmasters Stronger: Complete [No Shards] ten times.
descriptions.96: [{{number}}] Summoning Enhancements: Complete [No Shards] twenty times.
descriptions.98: [{{number}}] Perfect Foresight: Complete [No Shards] seventy-five times.
descriptions.107: [{{number}}] Digging Deep: Complete [Reduced Diamonds] three times.
descriptions.108: [{{number}}] Frack As Needed: Complete [Reduced Diamonds] five times.
descriptions.109: [{{number}}] Unobtainium Pickaxe: Complete [Reduced Diamonds] ten times.
descriptions.110: [{{number}}] Fortune III: Complete [Reduced Diamonds] twenty times.
descriptions.111: [{{number}}] Every kiss...: Complete [Reduced Diamonds] fifty times.
descriptions.112: [{{number}}] ...begins with K.: Complete [Reduced Diamonds] seventy-five times.
descriptions.114: [{{number}}] Keeping up with the Joneses: Complete {[Tax+]} twice.
descriptions.120: [{{number}}] Is there anybody in there?: Complete {[No Accelerator/Multiplier]} once.
descriptions.123: [{{number}}] A slow nickel: Complete {[No Accelerator/Multiplier]} five times.
descriptions.124: [{{number}}] Multipliers don't even work 0/5: Complete {[No Accelerator/Multiplier]} ten times.
descriptions.125: [{{number}}] Accelerators don't even work -5/5: Complete {[No Accelerator/Multiplier]} fifteen times.
descriptions.126: [{{number}}] ACCELERATOR BOOSTS DON'T EVEN WORK -100/5: Complete {[No Accelerator/Multiplier]} twenty-five times.
descriptions.127: [{{number}}] I hate this challenge: Complete Cost++ Once.
descriptions.128: [{{number}}] A costly mistake: Complete Cost++ Twice.
descriptions.130: [{{number}}] Are you broke yet? Complete Cost++ Five Times.
descriptions.131: [{{number}}] The world of Finance: Complete Cost++ Ten Times.
descriptions.132: [{{number}}] Marginal Gains: Complete Cost++ Twenty Times.
descriptions.133: [{{number}}] I buy these: Complete Cost++ Twenty-Five Times.
descriptions.135: [{{number}}] Ant-i Runes: Complete No Runes Twice.
descriptions.136: [{{number}}] Isn't it getting tiresome?: Complete No Runes Three Times.
descriptions.137: [{{number}}] Machine does not accept offerings: Complete No Runes Five Times.
descriptions.138: [{{number}}] Runes Suck 1/5: Complete No Runes Ten Times.
descriptions.139: [{{number}}] I didn't even notice Prism was gone: Complete No Runes Twenty Times.
descriptions.140: [{{number}}] Atheist: Complete No Runes Twenty-Five Times.
descriptions.147: [{{number}}] End of the Universe: Complete {[Sadistic I]} Twenty-Five Times.
descriptions.152: [{{number}}] Perhaps you should brake: Purchase 2,000 Accelerators.
descriptions.153: [{{number}}] Exit the vehicle now!: Purchase 12,500 Accelerators.
descriptions.158: [{{number}}] Feeling the cost growth yet?: Purchase 500 Multipliers.
descriptions.159: [{{number}}] Perhaps you'll feel the cost now: Purchase 2,000 Multipliers.
descriptions.163: [{{number}}] Can't the speedometer move any faster?: Purchase 10 Accelerator Boosts.
descriptions.166: [{{number}}] Breaking the laws of Physics: Purchase 1,000 Accelerator Boosts.
descriptions.169: [{{number}}] The Galactic Feast: Obtain 3 Galactic Crumbs.
descriptions.170: [{{number}}] Only the finest: Obtain 100,000 Galactic Crumbs.
descriptions.172: [{{number}}] Accumulation of Food: Obtain 1e20 Galactic Crumbs.
descriptions.174: [{{number}}] Unlimited Bread Sticks!: Obtain 1e500 Galactic Crumbs.
descriptions.175: [{{number}}] Restaurant at the end of the Universe: Obtain 1e2500 Galactic Crumbs.
descriptions.176: [{{number}}] Ant-icipation!: Amass a 2x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 2 Ant.
descriptions.177: [{{number}}] Ant-ecedent: Amass a 6x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 3 Ant.
descriptions.178: [{{number}}] Ants are friends, not food!: Amass a 20x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 4 Ant.
descriptions.179: [{{number}}] Ant Devil?: Amass a 100x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 5 Ant.
descriptions.180: [{{number}}] The world's best chef: Amass a 500x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 6 Ant.
descriptions.181: [{{number}}] 6 Michelin Stars: Amass a 6,666x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 7 Ant.
descriptions.182: [{{number}}] Keys to the Restaurant at the end of the Universe: Amass a 77,777x Ant Multiplier through sacrifice and own a Tier 8 Ant.
descriptions.185: [{{number}}] Give me Ten!: Ascend Ten Times.
descriptions.186: [{{number}}] Give me a Hundred: Ascend 100 Times.
descriptions.187: [{{number}}] Give me a Thousand: Ascend 1,000 Times.
descriptions.188: [{{number}}] Give me some arbitrary number I: Ascend 14,142 Times.
descriptions.189: [{{number}}] Give me some arbitrary number II: Ascend 141,421 Times.
descriptions.190: [{{number}}] Now that's what I call getting some Pi!: Attain a constant of 3.14.
descriptions.191: [{{number}}] One in a million: Attain a constant of 1,000,000 [1e6].
descriptions.192: [{{number}}] A number: Attain a constant of 4.32e10.
descriptions.193: [{{number}}] The coolest of numbers: Attain a constant of 6.9e21.
descriptions.195: [{{number}}] Epsilon > a lot: Attain a constant of 1e66.
descriptions.199: [{{number}}] Destruction: Clear 'Reduced Ants' challenge three times.
descriptions.200: [{{number}}] War, what is it good for?: Clear 'Reduced Ants' challenge five times.
descriptions.201: [{{number}}] Absolutely everything.: Clear 'Reduced Ants' challenge ten times.
descriptions.202: [{{number}}] Perfect Storm: Clear 'Reduced Ants' challenge twenty times.
descriptions.203: [{{number}}] Immaculate Storm: Clear 'Reduced Ants' challenge thirty times.
descriptions.204: [{{number}}] I didn't need those stupid reincarnations anyway!: Clear 'No Reincarnation' challenge once.
descriptions.206: [{{number}}] Nonmetaphysical: Clear 'No Reincarnation' challenge three times.
descriptions.207: [{{number}}] Living alone: Clear 'No Reincarnation' challenge five times.
descriptions.208: [{{number}}] DM me on discord if you read these names: Clear 'No Reincarnation' challenge ten times.
descriptions.209: [{{number}}] Yeah: Clear 'No Reincarnation' challenge twenty times.
descriptions.210: [{{number}}] Science! Clear 'No Reincarnation' challenge thirty times.
descriptions.211: [{{number}}] The IRS strikes back: Clear 'Tax+++' challenge once.
descriptions.213: [{{number}}] Economic Boom: Clear 'Tax+++' challenge three times.
descriptions.215: [{{number}}] 'Wow Platonic Tax sucks 1/5': Clear 'Tax+++' challenge ten times.
descriptions.216: [{{number}}] Haha this is hard for some reason: Clear 'Tax+++' challenge twenty times.
descriptions.217: [{{number}}] Taxes are hard: Clear 'Tax+++' challenge thirty times.
descriptions.218: [{{number}}] Shiny Blue Rock: Clear 'No Research' once.
descriptions.219: [{{number}}] It's like Avatar: Clear 'No Research' twice.
descriptions.220: [{{number}}] It's like Unobtainium: Clear 'No Research' three times.
descriptions.221: [{{number}}] It's like a thing: Clear 'No Research' five times.
descriptions.222: [{{number}}] It's like: Clear 'No Research' ten times.
descriptions.225: [{{number}}] Pretty Corrupt: Clear an Ascension with above 100,000 score.
descriptions.226: [{{number}}] Bought out: Clear an Ascension with above 1 million score.
descriptions.227: [{{number}}] Utterly Corrupt: Clear an Ascension with above 10 million score.
descriptions.228: [{{number}}] Antitrust: Clear an Ascension with above 100 million score.
descriptions.229: [{{number}}] Ant-i-trust: Clear an Ascension with above 1 billion score.
descriptions.230: [{{number}}] This is pretty unfair: Clear an Ascension with above 5 billion score.
descriptions.231: [{{number}}] Antichrist: Clear an Ascension with above 25 billion score.
descriptions.232: [{{number}}] Highly Blessed: Level your Speed Rune Blessing to 100,000.
descriptions.233: [{{number}}] Divine Blessing: Level your Speed Rune Blessing to 100,000,000.
descriptions.234: [{{number}}] Blessing III: Level your Speed Rune Blessing to 100 billion.
descriptions.235: [{{number}}] Spirit I: Level your Speed Spirit to 1 Million.
descriptions.236: [{{number}}] Spirit II: Level your Speed Spirit to 1 Billion.
descriptions.237: [{{number}}] Spirit III: Level your Speed Spirit to 1 Trillion.
descriptions.238: [{{number}}] Three-folded: [Hint: you may want to look into the inception]
descriptions.239: [{{number}}] Seeing red: [Hint: you may need a lot of red items]
descriptions.240: [{{number}}] ASCENDED: [Hint: you may need a LOT of Ascensions OR an particularly amazing Ascension]
descriptions.241: [{{number}}] Aesop: [Hint: you gotta be pretty dang slow]
descriptions.242: [{{number}}] Aesop's Revenge: [Hint: you gotta be pretty dang fast]
descriptions.243: [{{number}}] Unsmith: [Hint: unsmith emoji :unsmith: can be a pretty good input]
descriptions.245: [{{number}}] BLESSED: [Hint: Your Speed Blessing best be unreasonably high!]
descriptions.246: [{{number}}] Why? [Hint: Sometimes even 1 in over a Trillion counts!]
descriptions.247: [{{number}}] Challenging! [Hint: Challenge 11 is calling your name, but with even less Ants]
descriptions.248: [{{number}}] Seeing Red but not Blue: [Hint: Can you get red stuff without getting blue stuff?]
descriptions.249: [{{number}}] Overtaxed: [Hint: It might pay not to read!]
descriptions.250: [{{number}}] The Thousand Suns: [Hint: You need to fully research into becoming GOD]
descriptions.251: [{{number}}] The Thousand Moons: [Hint: You may need to cube yourself up]
descriptions.253: [{{number}}] Platonicism: Clear an Ascension with 1e12 score.
descriptions.254: [{{number}}] That's a handful!: Clear an Ascension with 1e14 score.
descriptions.255: [{{number}}] The game where everything is made up: Clear an Ascension with 1e17 score.
descriptions.256: [{{number}}] ... and the points don't matter: Clear an Ascension with 2e18 score.
descriptions.257: [{{number}}] Arguably moral: Clear an Ascension with 4e19 score.
descriptions.258: [{{number}}] Khafra's Personal Best: Clear an Ascension with 1e21 score.
descriptions.259: [{{number}}] 100 million million million!: Clear an Ascension with 1e23 score.
descriptions.260: [{{number}}] Highly Dimensional Being: Ascend a total of 10 million times.
descriptions.261: [{{number}}] Ant God's upheaval: Ascend a total of 100 million times.
descriptions.262: [{{number}}] Did you forget about Ant God?: Ascend a total of 2 billion times.
descriptions.263: [{{number}}] Ant God is unemployed thanks to you: Ascend a total of 40 billion times.
descriptions.264: [{{number}}] I hope you're happy with yourself: Ascend a total of 800 billion times.
descriptions.265: [{{number}}] Oh well: Ascend a total of 16 trillion times.
descriptions.266: [{{number}}] Keep up the gradual numerical increase: Ascend a total of 100 trillion times.
descriptions.268: [{{number}}] Achieve Mathematics: Achieve a constant of 1e5,000.
descriptions.270: [{{number}}] What comes after this?: Achieve a constant of 1e50,000.
descriptions.271: [{{number}}] LARGE BOY: Achieve a constant of 1e100,000.
descriptions.272: [{{number}}] LARGER BOY: Achieve a constant of 1e300,000.
descriptions.273: [{{number}}] LARGEST BOY: Achieve a constant of 1e1,000,000.
descriptions.275: [{{number}}] Have you enough cubes?: Singularity 2 times.

upgrades.1: Promotes romance and unity within the colony. [+12% Ant Speed / level]
upgrades.2: Sweetens crumbs to increase their value [Each level increases Crumb --> Coin Conversion efficiency, up to ^50,000,000]
upgrades.3: Swarms the Taxman into submission [Up to -99.5% taxes!]
upgrades.4: Scares you into running faster [up to x20]
upgrades.5: Imitates your body through magic shape-shifting powers [up to x40]
upgrades.6: Tries to please Ant God... but fails [Additional Offerings!]
upgrades.7: Helps you build a few things here and there [+3% Building Cost Delay / level, Cap 9,999,999%]
upgrades.8: Knows how to salt and pepper food [Up to 1,000x Rune EXP!]
upgrades.9: Can make your message to Ant God a little more clear [+1 all Rune Levels / level, Cap 10 Million]
upgrades.11: A valuable offering to the Ant God [Gain up to 3x Sacrifice Rewards!]
upgrades.12: Betray Ant God increasing the fragility of your dimension [Unlocks ant talisman, Up to 2x faster timers on most things]

descriptions.1: Gain a Worker Ant for your everyday life. Gathers Galactic Crumbs. Essential!
descriptions.2: Gain a Breeder Ant that produces Worker Ants automatically!
descriptions.3: Gain a Meta-breeder Ant that produces Breeder Ants automatically!
descriptions.4: Gain a Mega-breeder Ant that produces Meta-breeder Ants automatically!
descriptions.5: Gain a Queen Ant that produces Mega-breeder Ants automatically!
descriptions.6: Gain a Lord Royal Ant that produces Queen Ants automatically!
descriptions.7: Gain an ALMIGHTY ANT that produces Lord Royal Ants automatically!
descriptions.8: Gain a DISCIPLE OF ANT GOD that produces ALMIGHTY ANTS automatically!

1.name: No Multipliers Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
1.flavor: Multipliers make the game a little too fast. Let's take them out!
1.restrictions: Transcend and reach the goal except Multipliers do nothing but act like Accelerators, which are nerfed by 50%!

per.1: +10 base Multiplier Boosts! [+0.05 to power!] Current:
per.3: +0.04 base Rune exp per Offering! Current:

1.first: +1 free Multiplier! +1 Base EXP per offering used!

2.name: No Accelerators Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
2.flavor: Who needs accelerators? They do basically nothing now.
2.restrictions: Transcend and reach the goal except Accelerators do nothing! Multipliers are nerfed a bit as well.
2.first: +1 base offering for Prestige and Transcensions.

3.name: No Shards Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
3.flavor: Alright, now you're thinking, how else can I make the game harder?
3.restrictions: Transcend and reach the goal except you do not produce Crystals or Mythos Shards.

per.2: +0.5% to Grandmaster production per Mythos producer bought. Current:
per.3: When you use a rune, all other runes gain +0.01 EXP. Current:

3.first: Gain an offering automatically every 2 seconds!

4.name: Cost+ Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
4.flavor: You're getting rich now, but inflation hasn't happened yet? I don't think so!
4.restrictions: Transcend and reach the goal except Coin/Crystal producers, Accelerators and Multipliers cost more. [Gets harder each time!]

per.1: Accelerator Cost scale slows down by +5 purchases. Current:
per.2: Multiplier Cost scale slows down by +2 purchases. Current:

5.name: Reduced Diamonds Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
5.flavor: You ever wonder how you get so many diamonds?
5.restrictions: Transcend and reach the goal except you gain far fewer Diamonds from all sources [Gets harder each time!]

per.1: +0.01 Coin --> Diamond conversion exponent on Prestige! Current:

6.name: Higher Tax Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
6.flavor: The tax man caught wind that you reincarnated recently...
6.restrictions: Reincarnate and reach the goal except tax has a lower cap, and Coin production is divided by 1e250.
6.goal: Goal: Gain {{value}} Mythos Shards in challenge.

7.name: No Multipliers/Accelerators Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
7.flavor: You're really going to hate this one.
7.restrictions: Reincarnate and reach the goal except Accelerators and Multipliers do nothing. Coin Production is divided by 1e1,250.
7.goal: Goal: Gain {{value}} Mythos Shards in challenge.
7.first: Multiplier Boost power +25%! The first Discord-Booster Global Diamond Upgrade.

8.name: Cost++ Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
8.flavor: You thought you could outgrow inflation by Reincarnating?
8.restrictions: Reincarnate and reach the goal except Cost Scaling for producers and Accelerators/Multipliers scale much, much faster.
8.goal: Goal: Gain {{value}} Mythos Shards in challenge.
8.first: Unlock the Anthill feature! Includes 20 new Researches. A Global Diamond Upgrade.
